task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 54°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: Moving back 10.1 meters will give me a wider, more complete view of the target building, allowing me to see its full height from ground to roof for a more accurate estimation.
Based on the initial view of the target building, which appears to be a 5-story structure with typical floor height of ~3.6 meters, I estimate its total height to be 18 meters from ground to roof.
